abstract: Straight plays are doing well at the Broadway box office.
snippet: Straight plays are doing well at the Broadway box office.
lead_paragraph: Ticket sales for straight plays on Broadway were notably strong last week, according to theater box office data released on Monday, with most of those non-musical productions making gains in their grosses in an otherwise flat week for Broadway. Indeed, money-wise, new straight plays are poised to have one of their best fall seasons on Broadway in recent years.

headline.main: At Broadway Box Office This Fall, the Play's the Thing
